title: Cloud in a Bottle
summaries: The Cloud in a Bottle is an accessory that can be found in Gold Chests in the Underground and Cavern layers. When equipped, it allows the player an extra jump. The extra jump has a 75% jump duration compared to a normal jump, increasing the maximum height the player can reach without other accessories by 5 blocks, for a total of 11 blocks.

statistics.Tooltip: Allows the holder to double jump
statistics.Sell: 1
